description: Multiple authenticated command injection vulnerabilities exist in the Aruba InstantOS and ArubaOS 10 command line interface. Successful exploitation of these vulnerabilities result in the ability to execute arbitrary commands as a privileged user on the underlying operating system.

product.name: Aruba Access Points running InstantOS and ArubaOS 10

enisaIdProduct.product_version: See reference document for further details
